comments: Carp, a pen name for Daniel Crane, was a reversal of prac the first syllable of the term practical.
examples: Cactaceae Echinocactus trollieti Rebut ex Carp, Baltimore Cact. J. 2: 147. 1895.
source: Dates cited in the Death Certificate of David Crane issued by the District Columbia (via David Hollombe); however, Britton & Rose (in Cactaceae 3: 32, footnote. 1922) cited the middle name as "R." and the death year as "about 1901"
